name: The Wendigo Lurks
description:
Set in a house in the middle of nowhere

you must survive the monster that lurks this house

Do Not Die

wendigo from https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wendigo-28dea1b1f0eb4e348ab8a8afeae1b5ab

rigged by me, animated by me

sound design from my friend Mazen 

F to open flashlight

6 to open night vision camera 

4 to open  lighter

There is no Ending because there was no time for it

Game devs

Programmer : me (Yaman Abu Laban)  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqo2u2k1jcOfFFfsuARh1KQ

Sound Design : Mazen Alqassif
